text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Nishikawa was born on June 29, 1907. In August 1927, when he was a Hosei University student, he was selected the Japan national team for Far Eastern Championship Games in Shanghai. At this competition, on August 27, he debuted against Republic of China. On August 29, he also played against Philippines and Japan won this match. This is Japan national team first victory in "International A Match". He played 2 games for Japan in 1927. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1927||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1907 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan international footballers
title: Junji Nishikawa
